question: Which of the following is a characteristic of alpha decay? W) Alpha decay occurs in heavy nuclei where the electrostatic repulsion between the protons in the nucleus is large X) The mass of a nucleus that undergoes alpha decay will be changed by only a small amount Y) Neither the mass number nor the atomic number is changed Z) The atomic number increases by 1
answer:
W) ALPHA DECAY OCCURS IN HEAVY NUCLEI WHERE THE ELECTROSTATIC
REPULSION BETWEEN THE PROTONS IN THE NUCLEUS IS LARGE
